```{r}
# Create a data frame with the given data
data <- data.frame(
    SBP = c(109.6, 107.4, 140.3, 146.5, 98.2, 137.8, 124.1, 113.2, 127.8, 125.3, 108.5, 181.3, 137.4, 146.2, 142.4, 123.7, 129.6, 143.6, 160.7, 148.3),
    Hrs_day = c(7, 8, 9, 12, 6, 9, 10, 8, 9, 8, 6, 13, 10, 10, 9, 8, 8, 9, 11, 9),
    Area = c("east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "east", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west", "west")
)

# Fit a linear regression model
model <- lm(SBP ~ Hrs_day + Area, data = data)

# Print the regression equation
summary(model)$coefficients
```
